Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound  Reroute near 71st/Paxron
ShortDescription: NB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Exchange, Yates, South Shore, 67th, Jeffery and 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Exchange, Yates, South Shore, 67th, Jeffery and 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Paxton.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State and #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at State/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: #29 State and #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Roosevelt, Wabash, 16th and State due to street blockage near State/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#29 State and #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Roosevelt, Wabash, 16th, then resume their normal routes on State due to street blockage near State/Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.
